column2: Nuveen Credit Opportunities 2022 Target Term Fund

Nuveen Credit Opportunities 2022 Target Term Fund (the Fund) is a diversified closed-end management investment company. The Fund’s investment objective is to provide a high level of current income. The Company invests in a portfolio of investment grade corporate bonds and senior loans. It invests in various sectors, such as aerospace and defense, airlines, banks, chemicals, commercial services and supplies, construction and engineering, construction materials, consumer financing, containers and packaging, diversified financial services, diversified telecommunication services, energy equipment and services, entertainment, equity real estate investment trusts, food products, health care equipment and supplies, healthcare providers and services, household durables, independent power and renewable electricity producers, information technology services, machinery, media, metals and mining, mortgage and pharmaceuticals. The Fund’s investment advisor is Nuveen Fund Advisors, LLC.
